title: Space Force to select three providers of national security launch services
summary: The U.S. Space Force on July 14 released a revised draft solicitation for the next round of national security launch contracts, known as National Security Space Launch Phase 3.

title: India’s Second Lunar Lander on Its Way
summary: The Indian Space Research Organisation’s second lunar lander, Chandrayaan-3, is on its way to the Moon. ISRO is hoping for a better outcome than four years ago when they lost […]

title: House & Senate Appropriators Look To Cut NASA Funding
summary: House and Senate appropriators have introduced spending bills that would allocate slightly less funding to NASA in 2024 compared to the previous year, rather than the significant increase sought by the administration.

title: India takes a critical first step toward a second attempt to land on the Moon
summary: India has developed the Chandrayaan-3 mission on a shoestring budget.

title: House and Senate appropriators cut NASA’s budget
summary: House and Senate appropriators have drafted bills that would give NASA slightly less money in 2024 than it received in 2023, rather than the significant increase the administration requested.
